content: a crochet top this lacy and this cute shouldn t be so easy to make but it is skill level is easy beginner friendly and all makers welcome simple pattern made with mostly double_crochet and chain space i also added some cluster stitches for a little style worked from the top down in two panels which means you can easily customize the length all the way to a dress if you like the pattern uses a #1 fingering weight yarn and a 3mm crochet hook this lacy crochet tank top pattern is made with us terms and us women s sizes xs-xxl find the yardage requirements and finished measurements below if you re the reading type yarn needed 400 430 470 500 540 570 yards measurements after blocked xs = 15 51 body width across x 16 38 length s = 16 29 body width across x 16 38 length m = 17 58 body width across x 17 14 length l = 18 35 body width across x 17 14 length xl = 19 64 body width across x 17 90 length xxl = 20 41 body width across x 17 90 length materials i used lindy chain #1 fingering weight yarn 3mm crochet 2 stitch markers scissors yarn needle thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
